items.description: No. We start from the basics and quickly advance through projects and practical exercises.
You can choose either online or offline format depending on your preference and schedule.
The program lasts several weeks, with weekly workshops, mentorship, and final projects.

items.q: WILL YOU HELP ME FIND A JOB?
items.description: Yes. We provide portfolio guidance, mock interviews, and connections to our partner network.

freeTest.title: Take the test for free and find out your level!
freeTest.text: Answer a few simple questions and get instant results. Determine your current level of knowledge and understand where to start learning. The test is completely free and takes no more than 5 minutes.

features.title: Learn by Building
features.text: Short lessons + real projects guided by mentors.

features.title: Get Feedback
features.text: Receive comments and guidance from experts.

features.title: Get Job-Ready
features.text: Interview prep, tips, and job search support.

consultation.title: ANY QUESTIONS? WE’LL CONSULT YOU FOR FREE!
consultation.subtitle: Submit your request in 3 minutes. Our team will contact you within 24 hours.

about.text: Boost your career, income, and life to a new level. SkillUp has helped over 400 students get their first job in tech. Become the next one and change your life today!
